department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Historical Jesus
course.description: The course will introduce the students to the history of the quest for the historical Jesus by examining the most relevant methodological issues and by reviewing the ideological and socio-political stakes in this enterprise that has been intertwined to the cultural history of the western world from the XVIII to the XXI century.
course.notes: //Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1277.
